message: Let's split fairly, Bob. I know you value the money, so I'm offering you a slightly larger share in the hopes we can end this quickly.
Alice, your offer was generous, but let's be practical. Time is money, and each round costs us.  This offer ensures a good starting point for negotiations.
Bob, time is valuable, but so is fairness.  My offer is a compromise - more than your last, recognizing the time pressure, but still reflecting a balanced split.
